title: An apology for M. Antonia Bourignon in four parts ... : to which are added two letters from different hands, containing remarks on the preface to The snake in the grass and Bourignianism detected : as also some of her own letters, whereby her true Christian spirit and sentiments are farther justified and vindicated, particularly as to the doctrine of the merits and satisfaction of Jesus Christ.
author: Garden, George, 1649-1733.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for D. Brown ... S. Manship ... R. Parker ... and H. Newman ...,
